settings.heading: CORE Pickleball Camps: Elevate Your Game at the World’s Premier Pickleball Camp Experience
Ready to Take Your Pickleball Skills to New Heights? Join CORE Pickleball Camps!
settings.content: Welcome to CORE Pickleball Camps—where passion meets precision, and every player is empowered to improve. At CORE, we believe in transforming your game with the right blend of expert coaching, personalized feedback, and inspiring locations. Whether you’re a beginner aiming to master the basics or a seasoned player seeking to refine your strategies, CORE Pickleball Camps offer an experience unlike any other.

settings.heading: Book Your Spot Now!
settings.content: Spaces at CORE Pickleball Camps fill up fast. Don’t miss your chance to take part in a camp designed to take your game to the next level.

settings.name: Brett Noel
settings.content:
Brett Noel is widely recognized as one of “America’s Top Pickleball Instructors” and a 3-time National Gold Medal champion. With a global reach, Brett travels the world, empowering players to unlock their full pickleball potential. He has served as the lead instructor for prestigious programs such as Global Pickleball Training Academy, Engage Pickleball Camps, Level Up Camps, and currently, Core Pickleball.

As an instructor’s instructor, Brett has certified coaches worldwide, ensuring that effective pickleball techniques and strategies are passed down through top-notch training. He is also the author of three best-selling pickleball books, further solidifying his reputation as a leading authority in the sport.

Whether you’re a seasoned player or a newcomer, Brett Noel’s clinics offers the expert guidance you need to elevate your game to the next level. Don’t miss the opportunity to learn from one of the most knowledgeable figures in pickleball!

settings.name: Kevin Beeson
settings.content:
Kevin Beeson is an IPTPA and IFP Professional, a two-time National Champion, and has 30+ years of teaching tennis and pickleball around the U.S. and internationally. Kevin is the author of “Pickleball Metaphors: The Fast Track to Better Pickleball,” where he leverages his vast experience to provide players with effective strategies for improving their game.

His passion for sports not only drives him to excel in competition but also fuels his commitment to teaching. Kevin has worked with players of all ages, from beginners to advanced competitors, helping them develop their skills, understand the dynamics of the game, and enhance their overall performance.

In his book, Kevin uses creative metaphors to simplify complex concepts, making it easier for players to grasp essential techniques and strategies. This innovative approach has resonated with many, leading to noticeable improvements in their gameplay.

Additionally, Kevin is actively involved in the pickleball community, hosting clinics, workshops, and tournaments that encourage participation and foster camaraderie among players. His engaging teaching style and wealth of knowledge make him a sought-after coach and mentor in the sport.

Kevin’s dedication to pickleball exemplifies his belief in the transformative power of sports, as he continues to inspire and empower athletes around the world.

settings.name: Alex Simon
settings.content:
Alex Simon is one of the world’s top pickleball coaches. As a player, he reached the #2 singles ranking in the world (Champions Tour/DUPR) and competed full-time on the PPA and APP Tours.

He currently works with some of the world’s top pickleball touring pros, including APP/MLP top-10 player Mari Humberg, PPA/MLP top-25 player Patrick Kawka and PPA/MLP top-30 player Pesa Teoni. In addition, he also works with tennis legend Andre Agassi on his pickleball game.

Alex travels the world running clinics and has taught hundreds of players in the United States and abroad, including Hong Kong, Italy, Brazil, Kenya, South Africa, Tanzania and Mexico.

As part of his commitment to the sport, Alex also provides equipment and teaches pickleball to children in need through his charity, 002 Fund.

settings.name: Stephanie Lynn
settings.content:
With over 20 years of coaching experience, Stephanie Lynn has made a seamless transition into the world of pickleball, where she has quickly achieved a 5.0 rating and established herself as a top competitor in the modern game.

Stephanie’s extensive knowledge of body mechanics, offensive and defensive strategies, and real-time adaptability gives her training sessions a dynamic and impactful edge. Her mission is to help players develop essential skills, focusing on consistency, strategic shot selection, and situational awareness.

Stephanie’s journey reflects that of her students—setting ambitious goals, committing to disciplined practice, and continuously striving for growth. With her positive energy, deep understanding of the game, and extensive experience, she is dedicated to honing your offensive and defensive instincts, especially within the critical first five shots in pickleball. Stephanie’s passion for teaching and commitment to improvement make her camps an experience you’ll want to return to time and time again.

settings.name: Steve Cole
settings.content:
Married to Wife Denise Cole and resides in Las Vegas since 1997.

Senior Pro Player since 2016

Pro Instructor at Plaza Hotel & Casino PB since 2019

IPTPA Level 2 Certified Instructor

7 X National Champion , 11 X Medalist

9 X U.S. Open Champion

15 X World Champion (Huntsman World Sr. Games)

127 Gold Medals at the Pro/5.0 Level.

Has taught over 6,000 Players since 2018.

Has Lead Camps all over the World including Turks and Caicos , Dominican Republic , Costa Rica , Los Cabos , North Carolina , Canada and Hawaii.

settings.name: Nick Casey
settings.content:
Nick Casey is a 5.0+ pickleball player and coach. He has been involved in sports his whole life. From football to rock climbing and everything in between. Whenever there was an opportunity to play a new sport, Nick happily took that opportunity. Over a decade ago, Nick was introduced to pickleball and fell in love immediately. He loved the community and felt that he had been welcomed into a family. Nick quickly advanced from a true beginner to a 4.5+ player and eventually to a 5.0+ player. He has played in many high level and professional tournaments.

Nick has now been coaching for over 5 years. He recently began working with residential mental health facilities providing pickleball group sessions as a way to promote health and wellness. He is excited to share the knowledge he has gained in the last 10+ years of playing.

settings.heading: Why Choose CORE Pickleball Camps?
settings.content:
1. Elite-Level Coaching

Our camps are led by the best coaches in the game, from pros who compete at the highest levels to certified instructors with years of teaching experience. CORE’s instructors don’t just show you how to play—they give you the tools and insights to play better, smarter, and stronger.

2. Personalized Attention with Small Group Training

CORE is committed to ensuring every player gets one-on-one attention with a low player-to-coach ratio. Small group sizes mean more individual feedback, hands-on drills, and personalized strategies to improve your skills fast.

3. World-Class Facilities in Stunning Destinations

From resort-style accommodations to pristine pickleball courts, CORE Pickleball Camps are held at some of the world’s most beautiful and exciting locations. Train hard, then unwind in the scenic surroundings and enjoy a getaway that’s as relaxing as it is rewarding.

4. Comprehensive Player Development

At CORE, we focus on total player development: skill-building, strategy, fitness, and mental conditioning. Our camps provide the techniques and confidence needed to transform your entire approach to the game, so you leave a stronger, more strategic player.

5. Unmatched Camaraderie & Community

CORE Pickleball Camps are more than just a training ground—they’re a community. Connect with players who share your passion, and form friendships that last far beyond camp. Our welcoming, inclusive environment encourages growth, support, and plenty of fun both on and off the court.

settings.heading: Beginner
settings.description:
CORE beginner camps are designed for new players who have minimal pickleball fundamentals and want to learn the proper stroke mechanics, court positioning and rules to take their game to the next level.

Beginner camps involve:
  • Rules (Scoring and All Essential Game Rules)
  • Serving and Returning (Grip, Purpose, Positioning, Placement, Technique, Strategy)
  • Dinking (Purpose, Techniques, Strategy, Shifting, Communication)
  • Transitioning from Baseline to Non-Volley Line (3rd Shot Drops and Drives)
  • Punch Volleys (Beating the Bangers)
  • Offensive Shots (Drives, Lobs, Overheads)
  • Video Analysis
  • Beginner Drills and Games

settings.heading: Intermediate
settings.description:
CORE intermediate camps are designed for players who have a knowledge of the basics and are ready to take their abilities and strategies to the next level.

Intermediate camps involve:
  • Dinking ( Purpose, Mechanics, Offensive, Defensive )
  • Court Positioning ( Shifting, Communication, Purpose, Footwork )
  • Transitioning from Baseline to Non-Volley Line (3rd Shot Drops and Drives)
  • Volleys ( Punch, Block, and Roll )
  • Offensive Shots ( Lobs, Overheads, Speed Up's)
  • Serving and Returning (Purpose, Positioning, Placement, Technique, Strategy)
  • Simulated Points with Professional Feedback
  • Video Analysis
  • Intermediate Drills and Games

settings.heading: Advanced
settings.description:
CORE advanced camps are designed for players who are tournament ready or are competing in local / National tournaments.

CORE highly qualified professionals will refine your strokes, teach you the correct strategies to use in tournament situations, and focus on the mental side of competing at a high level.

Advanced camps involve:
  • Advanced Dinking ( offensive, defensive, topspin, slice, and placement )
  • Advanced Transitioning from Baseline, transition zone, to Non - Volley Zone
  • Offensive Shots ( Roll Volleys, ATP, Ernie, Shake n Bake, Speed Up’s, Drives n Drop)
  • Offensive Volleys ( Swing, Punch, Block, and Reset Volleys)
  • Offensive Serving & Returning ( Placement, Topspin, Slice, and Strategies)
  • Advanced Court Positioning ( Stacking offensively)
  • Hit Your Best Mindset
  • Offensive Lobs from the Non - Volley Zone
  • Simulated Points with Professional Feedback
  • Video Analysis
  • Advance Drills and Games

settings.heading: Elevate Your Game To Win at The Next Level
